frontmatter.title: Tracing with the AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry JavaScript SDK
frontmatter.description: This project contains components of the OpenTelemetry Javascript SDK for OpenTelemetry, a framework to collect traces and metrics from applications. In order to trace data from various web applications, OpenTelemetry provides plugins to automatically trace data from web applications. As OpenTelemetry does not recognize AWS X-Ray as an officially supported backend, configurations have to be made in the NodeTracerProvider provided by the OpenTelemetry API.

headings.value: Configure Global Tracer for AWS X-Ray
Export Trace Data to OTLP exporter
